comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: This is the current confrontation between Russia and the US and this is not good news to the international community. The American drone was on a routine flight across the Black Sea when these Russian aircraft intercepted it and facilitated its crash. Russia is claiming that there was no contact between its aircraft and the drone while the Pentagon is considering it an accident. But an investigation is still ongoing and the result will be out soon. Now the US is focusing on recovering the ruins of the drone because it might not want the Russians to have access to such a sensitive military intelligence device.I pray this confrontation will not lead to military escalation between these two world powers because the world might not recover easily from the impact. The US and its partners are avoiding any personal confrontation between them and Russia during this war in Ukraine.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: My man, what are you talking about when you say that the Black Sea is a boundary between Russia and the United States?.The Black Sea is a in-land Sea in the north on Turkey.Â  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_SeaThe only sea which is an actual frontier between Russia and USA is the Sea of Bering. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bering_SeaBack on topic, it is kind of reckless for any pilot to try to take down a drone by colliding their airplane against it.My best guess is that the pilot did not want to completely destroy the drone but rather make it to go down, so it can be captured and used by Russian intelligence to reverse-engineering it.It could be also a mis-calculation by USA military which made them to claim something which is not actually what happened.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-64975766The US military has released footage of a Russian jet crashing into one of its drones over the Black Sea.The US said the damage to the large drone meant it had to be brought down into the water near Crimea on Tuesday.Russia denied its Su-27 fighter jet clipped the propeller of the drone, but the video appears to back up the American version of events.It was in the Pentagon's interest to release this video - not least to verify its version of events.

They claimed that the MQ-9 Reaper drone crashed into the Black Sea because of the manoeuvring by the Russian fighter jets. Reuter reported that the two pilots of the Russian jets have been given an award by the defense minister Sergei Shoigu. If this award or recognition is real, it shows that the Russians are pleased with this military incident. It has been brought down in Iran, Afghanistan and Yemen. Most of these drones have self-destruct systems to avoid transfer of illegal transfer sensitive information and technology.
